ISSUE.TITLE: [RFE] Logical task execution based on variables
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: More so than just "on failure", "on success", and "always", please add logical execution of tasks for workflows. An example of this would be “linux provision machine”, if vmware then “these playbooks” if amazon then “these playbooks” etc.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5084 from ansible/ui_issue_9409 Remove test button from logging settings screen
